subScenes.name: 询问包裹
subScenes.description: 员工向前台确认是否有自己的快递

qaPairs.speakerText: Hey, any packages for me today?

responses.text: Yeah, there's one under your name.
Let me check the system for you.
Not yet, should arrive after lunch.

qaPairs.usageNote: 日常询问包裹，用口语缩写更自然

qaPairs.speakerText: Is there a package from Amazon with my name on it?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 有没一件寄给我的亚马逊快递？

responses.text: Yep, red box, third shelf.
I need your employee ID to verify.
responses.text_cn: 我需要你的员工号确认。

responses.text: Sorry, no Amazon here today.
responses.text_cn: 抱歉，今天没有亚马逊的。

qaPairs.usageNote: 具体描述寄件平台，提高核对效率

subScenes.name: 请求派送
subScenes.description: 员工请前台帮忙把快递送到办公室

qaPairs.speakerText: Can you drop this off at my desk? Thanks!
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 能帮我把这送到我工位吗？谢谢！

responses.text: Sure thing, I'll bring it over now.
I'm swamped right now, can you pick it up?
responses.text_cn: 我现在忙，你能自己来取吗？

responses.text: Will do, just sign here first.

qaPairs.speakerText: Could you send this to Marketing? It's urgent.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 能帮我把这送到市场部吗？很急。

responses.text: On it! I'll hand-deliver it in 5.
I need a department code for internal delivery.
responses.text_cn: 内部派送需要部门代码。

responses.text: I'll leave it at the front desk for them.
responses.text_cn: 我放在前台让他们自取。

subScenes.name: 确认签字
subScenes.description: 前台要求签收快递时的确认对话

qaPairs.speakerText: Need your signature for this one.

responses.text: No problem, here you go.
Can I sign digitally instead?
Wait, is this registered mail?

qaPairs.usageNote: 签收前确认快递类型很重要

qaPairs.speakerText: You gotta sign here, initials and full name.

responses.text: Got it, J.M. and Jane Miller.
Can I just write my first name?
I'll sign when I get back from lunch.

qaPairs.usageNote: 明确签名要求避免后续麻烦

subScenes.name: 寄送需求
subScenes.description: 员工说明寄快递的具体要求

qaPairs.speakerText: Can you ship this overnight to Boston? It's fragile.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 能帮我加急寄到波士顿吗？易碎品。

responses.text: We can do FedEx Priority, $45.
Do you have the box and label ready?
responses.text_cn: 盒子和标签准备好了吗？

responses.text: Can we use standard shipping instead?

qaPairs.usageNote: 说明易碎/加急，避免运输损坏

qaPairs.speakerText: I need to send this to a client tomorrow — any cut-off time?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我明天要寄给客户，最晚几点能寄？

responses.text: Cut-off's 3 PM for same-day shipping.
responses.text_cn: 当天寄送截止是下午三点。

responses.text: You're late — we're done for today.
I can hold it and send first thing tomorrow.
responses.text_cn: 我帮你留着，明早第一班寄。

qaPairs.usageNote: 询问截止时间避免错过时效

subScenes.name: 道别收尾
subScenes.description: 完成快递事务后的礼貌结束对话

qaPairs.speakerText: All set! Thanks for your help.

responses.text: Anytime, have a great day!
responses.text_cn: 随时找我，祝你今天愉快！

responses.text: No worries, see you at the coffee machine.
You're welcome. Don't forget your ID card.

qaPairs.usageNote: 道别时加祝福语提升职场亲和力

qaPairs.speakerText: Thanks again — I owe you a coffee.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 再谢一次，我请你喝咖啡。

responses.text: Haha, I'll hold you to that!
Just don't forget next time.
Saved! I'm grabbing one now.

qaPairs.usageNote: 用请喝咖啡表达感谢很职场常用
